mapper.select: select m_num, m_name, m_email , date_format(m_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') as m_date from member
mapper.insert: insert into member(member_nickname, member_name, member_id, member_pw, member_date, member_user, member_phone, member_mailauth, member_mailkey, member_email, member_address, member_warning, member_clean) values(#{memberNickname}, #{memberName}, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, now(), 1, #{memberPhone}, 0, #{memberMailkey}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberAddress}, 0, 50)
